page.title: 10Entertainment, Pitreavie.
page.content: Entertainment in Pitreavie. Modern pop music is very different from the music of hundreds of years ago. Today there are electric amplifiers and guitars. There are visual displays a well as coloured flashing lights and projected film screens. Some of the pop groups, are Big Country,Nazareth and the Skids. The Skids have now split up, like many other groups, whreas Big Country and Nazareth are going and are very popular. Barbara Dickson and Lulu lived in Dunfermline at one time. Lulu first sang in public at Rosyth. She had some big hits. Barbara Dickson is very popular at the moment. She had a number one hit with Elaine Page early in 1985. Carnegie Hall is no longer big enough for her concerts. Susan McIvar/ Nichola Ricketts.
